name: questionnaires
label:
## End Questionnaires

Great, you've made it this far. These four questionnaires are the last step before closing this part of the study!
Please take your time to complete these. They allow us to know how you were feeling overall during the study.

name: QuestionGAD
label: **Questionnaire 1 : Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?**

name: GAD_1
label: Feeling nervous, anxious or on edge
choice3: More than half of the days

name: GAD_2
label: Not being able to stop or control worrying
choice3: More than half of the days

name: GAD_3
label: Worrying too much about different things
choice3: More than half of the days

name: GAD_4
label: Trouble relaxing
choice3: More than half of the days

name: GAD_5
label: Being so restless that it is hard to sit still
choice3: More than half of the days

name: GAD_6
label: Becoming easily annoyed or irritable
choice3: More than half of the days

name: GAD_7
label: Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen
choice3: More than half of the days

name: QuestionBDI_II
label: **Questionnaire 2 : This questionnaire consists of 21 groups of statements. Please read each group of statements carefully. And then pick out the one statement in each group that best describes the way you have been feeling during the past two weeks, including today. If several statements in the group seem to apply equally well, circle the highest number for that group.**

name: BDI2_1
label: Sadness
choice2: I feel sad much of the time.
choice3: I am sad all the time
choice4: I am so sad or unhappy that I can't stand it

name: BDI2_2
label: Pessimism
choice1: I am not discouraged about my future
choice2: I feel more discouraged about my future than I used to
choice3: I do not expect things to work out for me
choice4: I feel my future is hopeless and will only get worse

name: BDI2_3
label: Past Failure
choice1: I do not feel like a failure
choice2: I have failed more than I should have
choice3: As I look back, I see a lot of failures
choice4: I feel I am a total failure as a person

name: BDI2_4
label: Loss of Pleasure
choice1: I get as much pleasure as I ever did from the things I enjoy
choice2: I don't enjoy things as much as I used to
choice3: I get very little pleasure from the things I used to enjoy
choice4: I can't get any pleasure from the things I used to enjoy

name: BDI2_5
label: Guilty Feelings
choice2: I feel guilty over many things I have done or should have done
choice3: I feel quite guilty most of the time
choice4: I feel guilty all of the time

name: BDI2_6
label: Punishment Feelings
choice1: I don't feel I am being punished
choice2: I feel I may be punished
choice4: I feel I am being punished

name: BDI2_7
label: Self-Dislike
choice1: I feel the same about myself as ever
choice2: I have lost confidence in myself

name: BDI2_8
label: Self-Criticalness
choice1: I don't criticize or blame myself more than usual
choice2: I am more critical of myself than I used to be
choice3: I criticize myself for all of my faults
choice4: I blame myself for everything bad that happens

name: BDI2_9
label: Suicidal Thoughts or Wishes
choice1: I don't have any thoughts of killing myself
choice2: I have thoughts of killing myself, but I would not carry them out
choice3: I would like to kill myself
choice4: I would kill myself if I had the chance

name: BDI2_10
label: Crying
choice1: I don't cry anymore than I used to
choice2: I cry more than I used to
choice3: I cry over every little thing
choice4: I feel like crying, but I can't

name: BDI2_11
label: Agitation
choice1: I am no more restless or wound up than usual
choice2: I feel more restless or wound up than usual
choice3: I am so restless or agitated, it's hard to stay still
choice4: I am so restless or agitated that I have to keep moving or doing something

name: BDI2_12
label: Loss of Interest
choice1: I have not lost interest in other people or activities
choice2: I am less interested in other people or things than before
choice3: I have lost most of my interest in other people or things
choice4: It's hard to get interested in anything

name: BDI2_13
label: Indecisiveness
choice1: I make decisions about as well as ever
choice2: I find it more difficult to make decisions than usual
choice3: I have much greater difficulty in making decisions than I used to
choice4: I have trouble making any decisions

name: BDI2_14
label: Worthlessness
choice1: I do not feel I am worthless
choice2: I don't consider myself as worthwhile and useful as I used to
choice3: I feel more worthless as compared to others

name: BDI2_15
label: Loss of Energy
choice1: I have as much energy as ever
choice2: I have less energy than I used to have
choice3: I don't have enough energy to do very much
choice4: I don't have enough energy to do anything

name: BDI2_16
label: Changes in Sleeping Pattern
choice1: I have not experienced any change in my sleeping
choice2: I sleep somewhat more than usual OR I sleep somewhat less than usual
choice3: I sleep a lot more than usual OR I sleep a lot less than usual
choice4: I sleep most of the day OR I wake up 1-2 hours early and can't get back to sleep

name: BDI2_17
label: Irritability
choice1: I am not more irritable than usual
choice2: I am more irritable than usual
choice3: I am much more irritable than usual
choice4: I am irritable all the time

name: BDI2_18
label: Changes in Appetite
choice1: I have not experienced any change in my appetite
choice2: My appetite is somewhat less than usual OR My appetite is somewhat greater than usual
choice3: My appetite is much less than before OR My appetite is much greater than usual
choice4: I have no appetite at all OR I crave food all the time

name: BDI2_19
label: Concentration Difficulty
choice1: I can concentrate as well as ever
choice2: I can't concentrate as well as usua
choice3: It's hard to keep my mind on anything for very long
choice4: I find I can't concentrate on anything

name: BDI2_20
label: Tiredness or Fatigue
choice1: I am no more tired or fatigued than usual
choice2: I get more tired or fatigued more easily than usual
choice3: I am too tired or fatigued to do a lot of the things I used to do
choice4: I am too tired or fatigued to do most of the things I used to do

name: BDI2_21
label: Loss of Interest in Sex
choice1: I have not noticed any recent change in my interest in sex
choice2: I am less interested in sex than I used to be
choice3: I am much less interested in sex now
choice4: I have lost interest in sex completely

name: reread
label: **Check that you have answered everything before submitting.**

name: QuestionSTAI_T
label: **Questionnaire 3 : A number of statements which people have used to describe themselves are given below. Read each statement and then choose the appropriate answer to indicate how you generally feel. There are no right or wrong answers. Do not spend too much time on any one statement but give the answer which seems to describe how you generally feel.**

name: STAI_4
label: I wish I could be as happy as others seem to be

name: STAI_8
label: I feel that difficulties are piling up so that I cannot overcome them

name: STAI_9
label: I worry too much ovver something that really doesn't matter

name: STAI_17
label: Some unimportant thought runs through my mind and bothers me

name: STAI_18
label: I take disappointments so keenly that I can't put them out of my mind

name: STAI_20
label: I get in a state of tension or turmoil as I think over my recent concerns and interests

name: reread2
label: **Check that you have answered everything before submitting.**

name: QuestionRRS
label: **Questionnaire 4 : People think and do many different things when they feel depressed. Please read each of the items below and indicate whether you almost never, sometimes, often, or almost always think or do each one when you feel down, sad, or depressed. Please indicate what you generally do, not what you think you should do.**

name: RRS_1
label: Think about how alone you feel

name: RRS_2
label: Think "I won't be able to do my job if I don't snap out of this"

name: RRS_3
label: Think about how hard it is to concentrate

name: RRS_4
label: Think about your feelings of fatigue and achiness

name: RRS_5
label: Think "What am I doing to deserve this?"

name: RRS_6
label: Think about how passive and unmotivated you feel

name: RRS_7
label: Analyze recent events to try to understand why you are depressed

name: RRS_8
label: Think about how you don't seem to feel anything anymore

name: RRS_10
label: Think "Why do I always react this way?"

name: RRS_11
label: Go away by yourself and think about why you feel this way

name: RRS_12
label: Write down what you are thinking about and analyze it

name: RRS_13
label: Think about a recent situation, wishing it had gone better

name: RRS_14
label: Think "I won't be able to concentrate if I keep feeling this way"

name: RRS_15
label: Think "Why do I have problems that other people don't have?"

name: RRS_16
label: Think "Why can't I handle things better?"

name: RRS_17
label: Think about how sad you feel

name: RRS_18
label: Think about all your shortcomings, failings, faults, mistakes

name: RRS_19
label: Think about how you don't feel up to doing anything

name: RRS_20
label: Analyze your personality to try to understand why you are depressed

name: RRS_21
label: Go someplace alone to think about your feelings

name: RRS_22
label: Think about how angry you are with yourself

name: reread3
label: **Check that you have answered everything before submitting.**
